author: lgo
msg: Fix endless loop when reading 0 bytes from an aggregate bucket. This fixes a
side effect of r1462, but the root cause - why does ssl_encrypt read 0 bytes
from a bucket - is still unfixed.
(read_aggregate): If reading 0 bytes, try to read from a child bucket first
(test_iovec_buckets): add test that reads 0 bytes from a non-empty iovec

author: lgo
msg: Fix issue 69: compile serf for Netware.
(serf_listener_t): Rename accept struct member variable to accept_func, to
avoid naming clash with Netware-specific macro's.

author: lgo
msg: * serf.mak: fix build of test suite on Windows.

author: lgo
msg: * buckets/deflate_buckets.c: Fix indentation, no functional change.
